chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: David's Psalm of praise.
items.plainText: David's Psalm of praise.

items.text: I will extol thee, my God, O king; and I will bless thy name for ever and ever.
items.plainText: I will extol thee, my God, O king; and I will bless thy name for ever and ever.

items.text: Every day will I bless thee; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever.
items.plainText: Every day will I bless thee; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever.

items.text: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised; and his greatness is unsearchable.
items.plainText: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised; and his greatness is unsearchable.

items.text: One generation shall praise thy works to another, and shall declare thy mighty acts.
items.plainText: One generation shall praise thy works to another, and shall declare thy mighty acts.

items.text: I will speak of the glorious honour of thy majesty, and of thy wondrous works.
items.plainText: I will speak of the glorious honour of thy majesty, and of thy wondrous works.

items.text: And men shall speak of the might of thy terrible acts: and I will declare thy greatness.
items.plainText: And men shall speak of the might of thy terrible acts: and I will declare thy greatness.

items.text: They shall abundantly utter the memory of thy great goodness, and shall sing of thy righteousness.
items.plainText: They shall abundantly utter the memory of thy great goodness, and shall sing of thy righteousness.

items.text: The LORD is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.
items.plainText: The LORD is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.

items.text: The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.
items.plainText: The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.

items.text: All thy works shall praise thee, O LORD; and thy saints shall bless thee.
items.plainText: All thy works shall praise thee, O LORD; and thy saints shall bless thee.

items.text: They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power;
items.plainText: They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power;

items.text: To make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, and the glorious majesty of his kingdom.
items.plainText: To make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, and the glorious majesty of his kingdom.

items.text: Thy kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and thy dominion endureth throughout all generations.
items.plainText: Thy kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and thy dominion endureth throughout all generations.

items.text: The LORD upholdeth all that fall, and raiseth up all those that be bowed down.
items.plainText: The LORD upholdeth all that fall, and raiseth up all those that be bowed down.

items.text: The eyes of all wait upon thee; and thou givest them their meat in due season.
items.plainText: The eyes of all wait upon thee; and thou givest them their meat in due season.

items.text: Thou openest thine hand, and satisfiest the desire of every living thing.
items.plainText: Thou openest thine hand, and satisfiest the desire of every living thing.

items.text: The LORD is righteous in all his ways, and holy in all his works.
items.plainText: The LORD is righteous in all his ways, and holy in all his works.

items.text: The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.
items.plainText: The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.

items.text: He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.
items.plainText: He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.

items.text: The LORD preserveth all them that love him: but all the wicked will he destroy.
items.plainText: The LORD preserveth all them that love him: but all the wicked will he destroy.

items.text: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever.
items.plainText: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever.
